page.title: 14MOWBRAY'S BUS COMPANY
page.content: Mowbray's Bus Company is based in South Moor where it has been for 55 years. The firm,known as J.S.Mowbray's, Stanley,Ltd.owns 10 white and green buses;8 are Bedfords,1 a Daf and 1 a L.A.G. 10 drivers,2 fitters,1 clerk and 1 cleaner are employed by the company which operates Continental and British tours,local contracts and local stage services. A daily bus service operates between Stanley and Durham,buses leaving every hour from 6.30a.m. A daily service also operates from Stanley to Quaking Houses,every half hour from 8.15a.m.About 2000 people use their buses every day.The time of the last bus is midnight except that on Sundays all the bus services finish at 11.45p.m.
